document.full_text: roy hibbert scored 24 points and danny granger had 17 of his 20 in the second half as indiana opened a two-game lead over charlotte and milwaukee for the last playoff position.
document.title: n.b.a. roundup: pacers top nets and up lead for playoff spot
lines_and_colors: roy hibbert scored 24 points and danny granger had 17 of his 20 in the second half as indiana opened a two-game lead over charlotte and milwaukee for the last playoff position.
